modName: Archmage and Vampire Royal Armor HD  by Den987
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][color=#660000][IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w422/Den987/TESV.exe_DX9_20150911_095858_zpstruqeq2e.jpg[/IMG]
======[/color][/size][color=#660000][b][font=Times New Roman][size=6][i]Description[/i][/size][/font][/b][size=5]======[/size][/color]
[font=Georgia][i][size=3]HD retexture of Archmage and Royal Vampire armor. Both versions M/F available. I've deleted pauldrons from male version of Royal Vampire Armor. Also, Valerica's armor haven't been changed. 
[/size] [/i][/font][font=Georgia][i]

[i][color=#660000][size=5]======[i][color=#660000][size=5][b]Requirements[/b][/size][/color][/i]======
[/size][/color][/i]No any requirememts


[/i][i][i][i][color=#660000][size=5]======[i][color=#660000][size=5][b]Body compatible[/b][/size][/color][/i]======
[/size][/color][/i][/i][size=3] it's COMPATIBLE with ANY body model.

[/size]

[color=#660000]======[/color][/i][i][b][color=#660000][size=5]Install&Uninstall[/size][/color][/b][/i][i][color=#660000]======[/color]
[/i][/font][font=Georgia][size=3][i]Install: Put all files to Data directory and activate esp file
Uninstall: Delete textures/clothes/archmage
textures/dlc01/clothes[/i][/size][/font][/center]
author: Den987
